description:
This interview features Christian Wenz (https://twitter.com/chwenz).

Christian has been involved in the web for a long time and he's the co-owner of the Munich-based web agency Arrabiata Solutions (http://www.arrabiata.de).

He's a .NET MVP (https://mvp.microsoft.com/en-us/PublicProfile/10224?fullName=Christian%20Wenz) and an established PHP community member.

In the interview we talk about PHP, the upcoming PHP7 release, Zendcon, the differences between PHP projects and .NET projects. The second part of the interview is all about Las Vegas hotels, shows and more.

The episode was recorded in the Jimmy Hendrix suite of The Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas (https://www.hardrockhotel.com) during Zendcon 2015 (http://www.zendcon.com)

► Follow me on Twitter - http://twitter.com/ThijsFeryn
► Read my blog - http://blog.feryn.eu
► Check my presentations - http://talks.feryn.eu
► Thanks to Combell for sponsoring the show - http://www.combell.com
title: Interview with Christian Wenz. Talking about PHP, .NET & Las Vegas
